verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Depart<s%>, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> hence, thou and the <S%H5971>people<s%> which thou hast brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it:

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and I will drive <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>:

Unto a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>: for I will not go <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee; for thou art a <S%H7186%H6203>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>: lest I <S%H3615>consume<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

¶ And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> these <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>tidings<s%>, they <S%H56>mourned<s%>: and no <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H7896>put<s%> on him his <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Ye are a <S%H7186%H6203>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>: I will come <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee in <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%>, and <S%H3615>consume<s%> thee: therefore now put <S%H3381>off<s%> thy <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> from thee, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> what to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>stripped<s%> themselves of their <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> by the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> it <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, afar <S%H7368>off<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H168>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>. And it came to pass, that every one which <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, which was <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, that all the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H5324>stood<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> at his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>, and <S%H5027>looked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, until he was <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And it came to pass, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and the LORD <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>, as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> unto his <S%H7453>friend<s%>. And he turned <S%H7725>again<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: but his <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, a young <S%H5288>man<s%>, <S%H4185>departed<s%> not <S%H8432>out<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> unto me, Bring <S%H5927>up<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>: and thou hast not let me <S%H3045>know<s%> whom thou wilt <S%H7971>send<s%> with me. Yet thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> thee by <S%H8034>name<s%>, and thou hast also <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, <S%H3045>shew<s%> me now thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> thee, that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>: and <S%H7200>consider<s%> that this <S%H1471>nation<s%> is thy <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H6440>presence<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with thee, and I will give thee <S%H5117>rest<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, If thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> not with me, carry us not <S%H5927>up<s%> hence.

For wherein shall it be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H645>here<s%> that I and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>? is it not in that thou <S%H3212>goest<s%> with us? so shall we be <S%H6395>separated<s%>, I and thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, from all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> also that thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: for thou hast <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and I <S%H3045>know<s%> thee by <S%H8034>name<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I beseech <S%H4994>thee<s%>, <S%H7200>shew<s%> me thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will make all my <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> before thee, and I will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to whom I will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%>, and will shew <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on whom I will shew <S%H7355>mercy<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>: for there shall no <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> me, and <S%H2425>live<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, there is a <S%H4725>place<s%> by me, and thou shalt <S%H5324>stand<s%> upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%>:

And it shall come to pass, while my <S%H3519>glory<s%> passeth <S%H5674>by<s%>, that I will <S%H7760>put<s%> thee in a <S%H5366>clift<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and will <S%H5526>cover<s%> thee with my <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> I pass <S%H5674>by<s%>:
And I will <S%H5493>take<s%> away mine <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> my back <S%H268>parts<s%>: but my <S%H6440>face<s%> shall not be <S%H7200>seen<s%>.
